samples.instruction: 12th à®ªà®Ÿà®¿à®•à¯à®•à¯à®®à¯à®ªà¯‹à®¤à¯‡ à®à®©à¯à®© competitive exams-à®•à¯à®•à¯ prepare à®†à®•à®²à®¾à®®à¯?
samples.current_output:
**12th-à®²à¯ à®‡à®°à¯à®•à¯à®•à¯à®®à¯à®ªà¯‹à®¤à¯‡ Prepare à®šà¯†à®¯à¯à®¯à®•à¯à®•à¯‚à®Ÿà®¿à®¯ Exams:**

**1. NEET (Medical):**
- For: MBBS, BDS, BAMS, BHMS, Nursing
- Subjects: Physics, Chemistry, Biology
- Exam: May (usually)
- Prepare from: Class 11 itself!

**2. JEE Main & Advanced (Engineering):**
- For: IIT, NIT, IIIT, GFTIs
- Subjects: Physics, Chemistry, Maths
- JEE Main: January & April
- JEE Advanced: After Main qualify

**3. CUET (Central Universities):**
- For: Delhi University, JNU, BHU, etc.
- Subjects: Domain subjects + Language + General Test
- New exam - gaining importance

**4. CLAT (Law):**
- For: National Law Universities
- Subjects: English, GK, Legal Reasoning, Logical Reasoning, Maths
- Exam: December
- Can start from Class 11

**5. NDA (Defence):**
- For: Army, Navy, Air Force
- Age: 16.5 - 19.5 years
- Exam: April & September
- 12th appearing can apply!

**6. KVPY (Kishore Vaigyanik):**
- Science scholarship + IISc admission
- For: Class 11 & 12 science students
- Exam: November

**7. NTSE (National Talent Search):**
- Scholarship exam
- For: Class 10 students
- Good for building competitive exam mindset

**Preparation Timeline:**

| Exam | Start Prep | Peak Prep |
|------|------------|----------|
| NEET | Class 11 start | Class 12 |
| JEE | Class 11 start | Class 12 |
| CLAT | Class 11 | Class 12 |
| NDA | Class 12 | After 12th |

**Parallel Preparation Tips:**
1. Board syllabus = 60-70% competitive syllabus
2. Extra topics identify & cover
3. Test series join early
4. Balance board + competitive

samples.instruction: Campus placement-à®•à¯à®•à¯ à®à®ªà¯à®ªà®Ÿà®¿ prepare à®†à®µà®¤à¯?
samples.current_output: Placement preparation: 1) Aptitude - RS Aggarwal, IndiaBix daily 2) Technical - Core subjects revision 3) Coding - HackerRank, LeetCode (for IT) 4) Resume - 1 page, achievement focused 5) Communication - Mock interviews practice 6) GD - Current affairs, articulation 7) HR questions - self-intro, strengths, goals. Timeline: Start 6 months before placement season. CGPA matters - maintain above 7 minimum. Internships boost resume significantly.

samples.instruction: I am visually impaired. Board exam-la enna special facilities kidaikkum?
samples.current_output: PWD exam facilities: 1) Scribe/Writer - you dictate, they write 2) Extra time - 20 minutes per hour 3) Separate room if needed 4) Large print question paper 5) Exemption from certain papers (language options). Apply: Through school with disability certificate (40%+). UDID card helps. Competitive exams: Same facilities available. Career: Many PWD-friendly government jobs reserved (4% reservation).

samples.current_output: Emergency steps: 1) Call warden immediately 2) College has tie-up hospital - use that 3) 108 ambulance if serious 4) Keep parent contact updated with warden 5) Student health insurance - claim process know 6) ESI hospital if eligible 7) Govt hospital - free emergency care for all. Preparation: Keep emergency contacts, medical history, blood group info with you. Health card carry. Prevention: Regular health checkup, don't ignore symptoms.

Other options: 1) Dropper year - many succeed 2) B.Sc Biology â†’ Research 3) Biotechnology. Reality check: 18 lakh applicants, 1 lakh seats - alternatives are not failure, different path.

samples.instruction: NEET Result-ku appuram Counselling eppadi nadakkum? TN-la seats eppadi kidaikkum?
samples.current_output:
**NEET Counselling:**

**Types:**
1. All India Quota (15%) - MCC
2. State Quota (85%) - TN Selection Committee

**TN Website:** tnmedicalselection.org

**Process:**
1. Online Registration + Documents + Fee
2. Choice Filling - List colleges in preference
3. Seat Allotment - Based on rank + choice + category
4. Reporting - Go to college, verify, pay, confirm

**TN Reservation:**
- OC 31%, BC 26.5%, MBC 20%, SC 18%, ST 1%
- 7.5% Govt school within each

**Fees:**
- Govt: â‚¹15,000/year
- Self-Finance: â‚¹5-15 lakh/year
- Deemed: â‚¹10-25 lakh/year

**Timing:** July-August usually

Apply: www.ugc.ac.in. NET exam pass aanaal automatic JRF.

samples.instruction: JEE Main & Advanced endraal enna? IIT-ku eppadi povadhu?
samples.current_output:
**JEE Exam:**

**Two Levels:**
1. **JEE Main:** For NITs, IIITs, State colleges
2. **JEE Advanced:** For IITs only (after Main qualify)

**JEE Main Pattern:**
- Physics, Chemistry, Maths - 100 marks each
- Total: 300 marks, 90 questions
- Online exam, 3 hours
- Negative marking: -1

**IIT Path:**
12th PCM (75%) â†’ JEE Main (Top 2.5L) â†’ JEE Advanced â†’ IIT

**TN Students:**
- TNEA uses JEE Main score option
- Anna University through TNEA: tneaonline.org

**Attempts:** 2 per year, Max in 3 consecutive years

samples.instruction: Myth or Fact: Myth: Marks mattum important, extra-curricular waste

samples.instruction: NEET exam pattern à®à®©à¯à®©? à®à®¤à¯à®¤à®©à¯ˆ marks?
samples.current_output: NEET UG Pattern: Total 200 questions (180 attempt), 720 marks. Subjects: Physics 45+15 Qs, Chemistry 45+15 Qs, Biology 90+10 Qs. Marking: +4 correct, -1 wrong. Syllabus: Class 11 & 12 NCERT Physics, Chemistry, Biology.
